glosses: plural of haşere; insects; vermin, creepy-crawlies

examples.text: 1936 October 23, advertisement for pest control in Akşam, page 12
examples.translation: Destroy flies, bedbugs, moths, fleas, and other pests along with their eggs before they retreat to their nests for the winter.

etymology: From Ottoman Turkish حشرات, from Arabic حَشَرات (ḥašarāt), plural of حَشَرة (ḥašara) whence haşere.
